name: Ralph Loop
description: Enhanced progress tracking modal in QuizMyself repo, via hamburger button (replacing roadmap). Aligns with best practices from Jira, Trello, GitHub: agile roadmaps with goals, flexible iteration, data-driven prioritization, visual timelines/milestones, stakeholder collaboration, automated integrations. Tracks issues (features, bugs, requests, questions) with IDs, API numbers, GitHub links, timestamps, SDLC progress. Features category filters, per-item progress bars, Vandromeda API feedback on GitHub opens. Items expand for lifecycle details (birth, events, timestamps). Logged-in users star items for API-tracked personalization.

stories.title: Align with Strategic Goals and Vision
acceptance_criteria: Define clear product vision tied to business objectives

stories.title: Hamburger Button and Modal Setup
acceptance_criteria: Load modal on click with flexible, visual layout (timelines, milestones)
Support frequent reviews/updates per best practices

stories.title: Comprehensive Issue Tracking
acceptance_criteria: Unique IDs for features, bugs, requests, questions
Include API registration, GitHub issue links, timestamps
Track SDLC stages with progress bars per item
Prioritize based on data (engagement metrics, user feedback)

stories.title: Advanced UI and Filters
acceptance_criteria: Category filters in modal (feature, bug, etc.)
Expandable items showing full lifecycle: birth, events, timestamps, history
Visual elements: progress bars, dependencies, milestones

stories.title: Integrations and Automation
acceptance_criteria: Automate feedback to Vandromeda API on GitHub issue creation
User starring for personalized tracking in API

stories.title: Flexibility and Iteration
acceptance_criteria: Support agile updates: themes, goals over rigid timelines
